name: A Few Nights Room And Board
name_original: A Few Nights Room And Board
description:
A possibly unofficial submission to the Messy Spooky Game Jam themed around halloween. It reuses some significant character control code, but the rest is new. Whether the submission is official or unofficial, we hope you will enjoy playing it and we hope you will leave feedback in the comments or on discord!

Like all good horror stories, there are bugs everywhere

Recommended specs: GTX 1060 or above

Jam Page:

https://itch.io/jam/a-messy-spooky-game-jam
